title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Research Scientist Post
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER Chandigarh) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for the M.Sc., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligble candidates ca...
